name: Tank Payments
headline: Modern financial infrastructure for the trucking industry.
description: Tank Payments is building modern financial infrastructure for the trucking industry. We offer payables automation software for logistics businesses that make hundreds of payments to trucking businesses every day. For trucking businesses, we provide a best-in-class banking platform, designed to meet the unique financial needs of the trucking sector.

founders.name: Dane Cook, Founder
founders.description: Dane is a co-founder of Tank Payments. Prior to Tank, Dane managed product teams at Amazon. Before that, he worked at a startup building a semantic knowledge graph and a startup that sold data to hedge funds. Dane started his career at a Wall Street investment bank.

founders.name: Jad Rahbany, Founder
founders.description: Jad is a co-founder of Tank Payments. Prior to Tank, Jad was a Software Engineer at Amazon working on the Alexa AI team, and a Product Manager at Google and Graphiq (acq. by Amazon). Originally from Lebanon, Jad graduated from Cornell University with a degree in Computer Science and a minor in Business.

founders.name: Matthew Rybak, Founder
founders.description: Matthew Rybak is the co-founder of Tank Payments. Matthew heads factor business development and product at Tank. He started out in financial services (Citigroup), but quickly moved to a tech startup in Santa Barbara CA (FindTheBest/Graphiq), which was acquired by Amazon Alexa AI in 2017. Since departing Amazon, he has started a RE development firm, a website (Truckinfo.net), and Tank Payments. He earned a Bachelors and Masters in Systems Engineering from the University of Pennsylvania.

# Making money move in freight.
We built the financial infrastructure that enables freight businesses to get paid and make payments faster.
[Get in Touch](https://www.tankpayments.com/<#email-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca97c47a18f50b17930dd7_Tank%20Hero%20Trio.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64529cd0ddf00e5c866564a8_Section%20Shape_Bottom%20White.svg)
ABOUT US
# We’re eliminating friction between freight businesses.
Freight moves quickly. We've built financial tools specifically for this fast-paced industry.
[Get in Touch](https://www.tankpayments.com/<#email-form>)
### [Payment Solutions for Factors & Brokers![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/645a9e6ff6b669f0338d1fcc_Factors.png)We help businesses simplify, automate, and accelerate payments made to freight carriers.Learn more](https://www.tankpayments.com/<#factors>)
### [Financial Services for Carriers![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/645a9e6f64bd4e03bc70c788_Carriers.png)We open full-service financial accounts for freight carriers, with services that normal banks can't offer.Learn more](https://www.tankpayments.com/<#freight-carriers>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64dfef23ec1e732f96502392_Tank%20Diagram.png)
FOR FREIGHT CARRIERS
# Full-Service financial accounts built specifically for freight carriers.
Freight businesses aren't like other businesses. They need a banking solution that can keep up.
[Get in Touch](https://www.tankpayments.com/<#email-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca6a65dfd9feea98f0acec_Icon_Instant.svg)
Get money into your account, instantly.
Get paid instantly straight to your account cheaper than wires, faster than ACH.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca5db52bfb5684e0b6254d_Send%20Money.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca6a664d0f2160aa9c8f21_Icon_Send%20Money.svg)
Send money to where you want, when you want.
Our money moves 24/7, just like you. Transfer your money to peers, different accounts or fuel cards.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca6a655a0181f9bafa2328_Icon_Manage.svg)
Optimize management across your fleet
Monitor spend, receive SMS fraud alerts, create fleet reports, and give your team access to money when they need it.

Get paid by factors and brokers outside of business hours. Transfer your money to peers, different accounts or even fuel cards.](https://www.tankpayments.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca6a655a0181f9bafa2328_Icon_Manage.svg)Optimize your fleet's spendMonitor your fleet's spend, receive SMS fraud alerts, create fleet reports, and give your team access to money when they need it.](https://www.tankpayments.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)

the tank card
# A no-commitment, no-fee commercial Visa card
A card built for carriers. Manage and monitor cardholders directly on the Tank app. Accepted anywhere Visa is accepted.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca684f8c50385b0a5176db_Checkmark.svg)
No overdraft fees
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca684f8c50385b0a5176db_Checkmark.svg)
No maintenance fees
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca684f8c50385b0a5176db_Checkmark.svg)
No fees for withdrawals at VISA Plus Alliance ATMs.


FOR FACTORS
# Simplify and automate payments made to freight carriers.
We work with your software to deliver money to your clients - automatically.
[Get in Touch](https://www.tankpayments.com/<#email-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca5e8110c6e416be288cf4_Factors_Fund%20in%20seconds.webp)
Fund your customers within seconds
Be the first to offer truly instant payments to your clients.
Do it all without needing to upload Nacha files or initiating wires.
Generate a new revenue stream
Revenue from transfer fees is old-school. Future-proof your business and monetize with our custom card programs for factors and brokers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca5e81e83ff30c495214d2_Factors_Generate%20Revenue%20Streams.webp)
Recover from Fraud
Recover funds sent in error. Never fund the wrong bank accounts again
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca5e81f90c9a37bed6862d_Factors_Standup%20to%20Fraud.webp)
Automate your payouts
Save time by paying out your clients securely with a single click
Don’t pick up the phone to divide payments across multiple client bank accounts and fuel cards
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62291652a86b53583094c14a/64ca5e815a0181f9baec8556_Factors_Automate%20Payouts.webp)
TESTIMONIALS

generated_description:
Tank Payments, founded in 2022 and based in Austin, TX, is revolutionizing the financial landscape for the trucking industry. As a member of Y Combinator's Batch S22, their mission is clear: to build a modern financial infrastructure specifically tailored to the unique needs of logistics businesses. With a small but agile team of seven, they’re focused on innovation in a sector that is often overlooked by traditional financial services.

So, what does Tank Payments offer? They provide payables automation software that streamlines payment processes for logistics companies that handle numerous transactions daily. Trucking businesses benefit from a banking platform built specifically for them—one that offers features and services that traditional banks typically don’t.

If you’re a freight carrier, Tank Payments provides full-service financial accounts designed around the fast-paced demands of your business. Their solutions enable you to get paid instantly—cheaper than traditional wire transfers and faster than ACH. Additionally, with a no-commitment, no-fee commercial Visa card, they make managing finances not just efficient but also hassle-free.

On the other side, for factors and brokers, they simplify and automate payments to freight carriers. Their system allows for instant funding to clients without the cumbersome process of uploading files or initiating wires. This innovation not only enhances service offerings but also opens up new revenue streams.

What really sets Tank Payments apart is their focus on eliminating friction in the financial transactions of freight businesses. They understand that in this industry, time is money, and their tools are built to ensure that money moves as quickly as the freight itself.

With endorsements from satisfied customers and partnerships with leading financial technology firms, Tank Payments is not just a service provider; they're a partner in the growth of every trucking business they work with.
